sentences.en: A 20 % chance to stun your opponent is absolutely amazing.
sentences.cn: 20%的几率击晕对手是很惊人的.

sentences.en: A guard zapped him with the stun gun.
sentences.cn: 一名警卫用眩晕枪击中了他。

sentences.en: A stun simulated detecting system has build in WIN 32 system.
sentences.cn: 在WIN32系统上实现STUN协议对NAT探测的模拟.

sentences.en: ALG 、 Media Proxy 、 STUN 、 Middlebox and so on are the current solutions.
sentences.cn: 现有的解决方案有ALG、MediaProxy、STUN、 Middlebox等.

sentences.en: And besides , - two dollars was quite a stun, not to be picked up every day.
sentences.cn: 再说呢, 两块钱是两块钱, 这不是天天能遇到的事.

sentences.en: Especially if you can afford it after a successful concussive shot stun.
sentences.cn: 特别是你在震荡射击成功击晕对手后使用.

sentences.en: He's stunned by today's resignation of his longtime ally.
sentences.cn: 他被自己的长期助手今天的辞职所震惊。

sentences.en: Improved Concussive Shot - The stun effect can now be resisted.
sentences.cn: 震荡射击:眩晕效果有可能被抵抗了.

sentences.en: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by 3 %.
sentences.cn: 使你抵抗昏迷 、 惧和沉默效果的几率提高3%.

sentences.en: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by 3 %.
sentences.cn: 使你抵抗昏迷 、 恐惧和沉默效果的几率提高3%.

sentences.en: Intercept will now cause damage to targets that are immune to stun.
sentences.cn: 即使目标免疫昏迷,拦截也会对其造成伤害.

sentences.en: Media Proxy 、 STUN 、 Middlebox and so on are the current solutions.
sentences.cn: 现有的解决方案有ALG、MediaProxy、STUN、 Middlebox等.

sentences.en: Nash is going to stun us all with his genius.
sentences.cn: 纳什会用他的才华吓到我们所有人.

sentences.en: Redfern stunned the crowd with a last-minute goal.
sentences.cn: 雷德芬在最后一分钟进球，使观众很是震惊。

sentences.en: Shield Stun: Stuns the top of the aggro chart , 3 s stun.
sentences.cn: 盾牌昏迷: 最大眩晕,3秒钟晕眩.

sentences.en: The impact of the ball had stunned her.
The snake uses its venom to stun or paralyze its victims.
sentences.cn: 蛇用其毒液使受害者失去知觉或瘫痪.

sentences.en: This speech seemed to stun the king.
sentences.cn: 这话似乎使国王大吃一惊.

words.tran_cn: 极好的；使人晕倒的；震耳欲聋的
绝妙地；令人震惊地；使人目瞪口呆地
致昏迷的一击；绝妙的东西；出色的人
使震惊；使不知所措（stun的过去式及过去分词形式）
把…打昏；使震耳欲聋；使大吃一惊（stun的ing形式）
昏迷；打昏；惊倒；令人惊叹的事物

trans.tran_cn: 昏迷；打昏；惊倒；令人惊叹的事物
使震惊；打昏；给以深刻的印象
trans.tran_en: to surprise or upset someone so much that they do not react immediately

trans.tran_cn: 击晕，使昏厥，使震聋，使目瞪口呆，使大吃一惊
trans.tran_en: to surprise or upset someone so much that they do not react immediately
